nexusNameSearch.dbaNameHeader: ### Find a Doing Business As (DBA) Name
nexusNameSearch.dbaNameDescription: Since the business name in your state of origin is unavailable, you will need a DBA name to register your business in New Jersey. Your DBA is the name your business will be referred to in New Jersey.
nexusNameSearch.dbaAvailableText:
"${name}" is available!

You can register this name when you [Authorize Your Business](/tasks/authorize-business-entity-foreign).
nexusNameSearch.dbaUnavailableText: Sorry, the name "${name}" is already taken in New Jersey. Please search for another DBA name. Here are similar business names that are already taken:

nexusFormationTask.warningText: To view this task, you must first complete [Check if Your Business Name is Available in New Jersey](/tasks/search-business-name-nexus)
nexusFormationTask.dbaCtaModalBody:
This link will take you to a PDF.

Only pages 23 and 24 are relevant to your formation. Complete those pages and send them to Treasury, the address is on the top left of page 23.
